text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape $BCDA$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BE$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $30$ units.
The length of the line $CE$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $AE$ is $30$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
Point $E$ also lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The line $BE$ is perpendicular to the line $AE$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $AE$, $BC$, $BD$, $BE$, $CD$, $CE$, $DE$ forming the shape $BCDA$ and its diagonals.
